dc.title: USGS Cascades Volcano Observatory (CVO)
dc.description: The U.S. Geological Survey's Cascades Volcano Observatory Website, which focuses on hazards, activity, history, and monitoring of volcanoes, with emphasis on volcanoes of the Western United States.
